description: NISO Digital Talking Book Standard, ANSI/NISO Z39.86-2005, defines the format and content of the electronic file set that comprises a digital talking book (DTB) and establishes a limited set of requirements for DTB playback devices.
name: Digital Talking Book.  ANSI/NISO Z39.86-2005
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">opf, xml, ncx, mp4, mp3, wav</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
